SENT.plain: OBJECTIVE: To assess the clinical efficacy of Tianma-cuzhi Granules (TMC) in treating senile vascular dementia(VaD) of the "sthenia of liver-yang" type
METHOD: TMC were given to thirty VaD patients three times a day of 0.5 g/bageach
The treatment course was one month and the patients finished two consecutive courses

RESULTS: TMC could markedly increase the mini-mental state examination (MMSE) and Hamilton depression scale(HDS) marks of VaD patients, and also contribute to improving certain indexes especially in abnormal cases
CONCLUSION: TMC have certain effects on senile VaD
